update.name: 2022.01.14-legacy
update.li: This is a legacy version for Android 4.1 to 4.4. Expect no future updates for old Android versions!
Restore functionality of OSM Mapnik online map
New app icon and minor style adjustments
Modernize app settings screens
Validation of login credentials in settings
Various translation updates
Some small code optimizations and bug fixes
Compile with a new target version to fulfill Google requirements - Please report any new issues to our support
Fix: Crash on change of some global settings
Fix: No app icon in status bar notification
Get link to offline maps from c:geo in map menu. Note: Requires Mapsforge V3 map in c:geo as WhereYouGo still only supports this version.
Various translation updates
New launcher icon according to Google Play requirements
Improve login usability by providing error messages in case of missing or wrong credentials
Make screen rotation optional
Use new whereyougo@cgeo.org support mail
Adjust map font size for devices with higher DPI
New option for automatic text scaling on maps
Optimize caching of map tiles and adjust menu entries for it
Android 8 fix for getting GPS when running in background
Fix crash on starting cartridge on Android 8 devices
Allow the app to run in landscape mode
Update translations for several languages
Various small code improvements and fixes
Update contact information for user support
Set default map to OSM instead of an empty map
Allow the app to run if screen is off
Fixed broken download of cartridges from wherigo.com by switching to https
Change the permissions handling to fulfill the requirements for Google Play
Update the code to support Android targetSdk 28
Removed and updated map online providers, fixed non working online maps
Improved German, Slovak translations
Minor GUI and code improvements
Added support for animated GIF and MP4.
Added Norwegian, Catalan languages
Improved German, Japanese languages
Clickable URLs in descriptions
Task state fixed, icons improved
Fixed occasional crashing when using timer or when the app is closing
Improved error messages when downloading a cartridge
Fixed issue with compass and timer
